Mr. BILIRAKIS. Mr. Speaker, in closing, I encourage a ``yes'' vote on  this particular bill. Again, I commend Representatives Trahan and  Carey. I yield back the balance of my time.

Mr. BILIRAKIS. Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

The yeas and nays were ordered.
